about_the_game:
Race the way you want and show the world the greatness you've built.

Join your friends in ADRENALINE, a fast-paced Zero-G racing game where you build your own custom racers from scrap. Explore the corners of the open-world environment on your own or online with your crew. Face off against your foes in gravity-defying races where you put your racer to its limit and win by any means necessary.

KEY FEATURES

Build your own Maglev Racer

  • Choose from a wide variety of vehicles as your base to build up your racer.

  • Build your own ride from the ground up or purchase pre-made builds to boost your performance and reach unimaginably intense levels of racing.

  • Customize every part to make your Maglev racer uniquely yours.

Cruise the streets with your friends throughout the system

  • Show off your prized ride in online, open-world sessions.

  • Explore the world and discover what secrets are hidden throughout the city.

  • Start impromptu races and challenge the other players where you can risk it all for cash or glory.

Start from the bottom and rise to glory

  • Begin your competitive career in the pits, using beaters to make your start in the league.

  • Take out your enemies and win races to gain cash and notoriety.

  • Move up the ranks until you’re racing in front of billions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or newer.
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600X.
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 1060 / AMD RX 580 / Intel Arc A380.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
